section.title: Cleanup and Maintenance
section.para: Each time you change the id element in a definition, either directly or indirectly using a command-line macro, Deploy creates new folders in the publish and cache folders (/var/www/html/deploy and /var/cache/deploy, by default). To preserve hard drive space, you may wish to review the publish and cache folders on occasion.
